MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Low Waters Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.07pm. Our engineers have arrived at  Butterburn substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.08pm on Tuesday 22nd December 2020
